attributes.action: raise the benefits for carers of disabled family members.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a carer for my wife and I gave my job up in order to look after her full-time. I earned £380 p/w after tax and now I receive £155 benefit made up of income support and carers allowance. Carers in our position must save the govvernment millions, if not billions, of pounds so therefore we should be rewarded a higher benefit to cope with everyday living and expenses. We are living well below the breadline. I want to know who feels the same.
